column4: I'm getting "Operation not supported" errors when getting larger files from my local (to this LAN) FTP-server
I've tried using gftp, which works.
But I'd prefer to use the standard method, so I can use it to stream over the network.
something to do with the server rather than your computer?
And it works with Firefox and gftp
/dev/sdb refers to the drive..mount mounts a partition
Maybe because it's a flash drive?
all my flash drives have partition..how would i mount them otherwise
Has been working fine for me though ;)
